articles.author: The Australian Financial Review
articles.title: Time to go back to the basics and buy stocks like these
articles.description: We, like almost every other investor on the planet, underestimated Trump’s resolve to reshape global trade and just how far he appears willing to go to do this.
articles.content:
Ten weeks ago, the US and global economic and market outlook was constructive – it was not great, but there were signs that Europe was bottoming out and that China was stepping up to support its economy.

articles.title: Trump says nuclear talks with Iran ‘going pretty good’
articles.description: US Middle East envoy Steve Witkoff and Iranian foreign minister Abbas Araghchi ‘briefly spoke’ together in Oman.
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump said talks concerning Iran’s nuclear programme were “going pretty good”.

articles.title: Talks on Russia-Ukraine peace deal 'going fine'
articles.description: US President Donald Trump has said that talks aimed at ending the war in Ukraine may be going OK, but "there's a point at which you just have to either put up or shut up."
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump’s commerce secretary says electronics tariff exemptions are temporary
articles.description: Howard Lutnick said semiconductor tariffs ‘are coming in probably a month or two’.
articles.content:

articles.author: RTE.ie
articles.title: Is Trump already living in China's world?
articles.description: As the smoke cleared from President Trump's tariff-induced global economic explosion, one clear target emerged - China.
articles.content:
As the smoke cleared from President Trump's tariff-induced global economic explosion, one clear target emerged - China.

articles.title: Trump ‘fully fit’ to serve as president, says doctor
articles.description: His blood pressure was 128 over 74, which is considered elevated.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump lawyers confirm wrongly deported Maryland man in El Salvador prison
articles.description: Administration fails to show they have taken any steps to facilitate the return of Kilmar Abrego García
articles.content:
The Trump administration on Saturday confirmed to a federal judge that a Maryland man who was wrongly deported last month remains confined in a notorious prison in El Salvador.

articles.title: U.S. State Department reveals status of Maryland man mistakenly deported to El Salvador
articles.description: In a filing on Saturday, the U.S. State Department, however, did not address a judge's demands that the Trump administration detail what steps it is taking to return Kilmar Abrego Garcia to the United States.

The Trump administration confirmed to a federal judge that the Maryland man mistakenly deported last month is "alive and secure" but remains confined in a notorious El Salvador prison.

articles.description: The royals, who are both in their mid-70s, show no signs of slowing down after four-day Italy trip.
